what about f-spot?
specifically, why are there copies of images with -1 in them? I.e. if I have an image named dcp1023.jpg there is another image named dcp1023-1.jpg
I gave up uderstanding this, but I figured out why it happens
f-spot may be set to copy every picture file to a ~/.Photos
that sounds like that's it
will it also make a backup of the original or something?
since it finds the files already there (with the original name) it shows a newer verion of the file as a -1

so that's from me importing the file twice then
